coreAttributes.name: metal bat
coreAttributes.description: A smooth metal club used to strike a ball as a form of sport. This particular bat has been enchanted for use as a weapon.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(ready)] [npc.her] metal bat in anticipation of using it as a weapon.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] metal bat at [npc2.name], grinning as it connects with [npc2.her] body!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] metal bat, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as it strikes [npc2.herHim] on the [npc2.arm]!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(swipe)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] metal bat, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(get)] whacked in the [npc2.arm]!

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] metal bat at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] metal bat, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(swipe)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] metal bat, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
